attributes.action: Digital IDs should never used to control citizens in any way.
attributes.additional_details:
Digital ID must never be a gateway to control. The UK is free—let’s keep it that way.

No to digital control. No to social scoring. No to programmable money.

Freedom means choice. Digital ID must never restrict speech, travel, or spending.

The UK is not a surveillance state. Let’s not become one.
attributes.background:
Digital IDs must never be used to control UK citizens.

Digital IDs must not restrict speech, travel, or purchases.

UK digital IDs must never enable control or surveillance.

No control via UK digital IDs—no scores, limits, or tracking.

rejection.details:
We are not clear what action you are seeking from the UK Government or Parliament. You can start a new petition setting this out more clearly.

You may also wish to sign this petition on a similar topic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730194
